name: Ladders and snakes
description:
How to play:

  • Click the die and it rolls for you. Screen shows which player's turn it is.

Classic ladders and snakes boardgame made with Godot. This was a real challenge for a newbie and I learned lots of new things by doing this. Making this took me 2 days and I made everything by myself out of scratch. In this project is lot's of nodes and lines of code.
